tool_description: The Multilingual Text To Speech is a powerful tool for converting written text into spoken words in multiple languages. It supports a wide range of languages including English, Spanish, French, Portuguese, Mandarin and Japanese. The API uses state-of-the-art text-to-speech technology to generate high-quality audio files that can be used in a variety of applications such as e-learning, voice assistants, and more. With this API, you can easily convert any text into speech in a matter of seconds...
name: Text To Speech
title: Text To Speech

api_list.name: Text To Speech Endpoint
api_list.description: Converts Input Text in voice of specified Speaker. Input text size is virtually **Unlimited**. You can Convert as many characters as you want in one request **without any extra cost**.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://text-to-speech67.p.rapidapi.com/tts"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "text-to-speech67.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://text-to-speech67.p.rapidapi.com/tts"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "text-to-speech67.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
